message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice! However, $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $135, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to consider a price of $132.50?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can do $137.50, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm starting to think I should consider other options...
I understand you're getting close to your maximum price, Alice. I'm willing to compromise further. Would you be willing to consider a price of $135?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'm going to try one more time. I'll meet you at $136. I think that's the best I can do.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm not willing to go above $134. I'm going to have to stop here. I'll think about it and get back to you if I change my mind.
